about_the_game:
Step into the role of a medium conducting a séance in a seemingly ordinary woman's apartment. What starts as a simple task quickly spirals into a suspense-filled nightmare as the room begins to exhibit strange and unexplainable anomalies.

Your goal is to survive until 7:00 AM by identifying these anomalies before they consume you. But beware—choosing the wrong anomaly resets the clock to midnight, forcing you to relive the harrowing night from the beginning. Each correct discovery pushes time forward, inching you closer to dawn.

Key Features:

  • Tense Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a chilling environment filled with subtle and startling supernatural occurrences.

  • Unique Gameplay Loop: A mix of horror and "spot-the-difference" mechanics keeps you on edge as you hunt for anomalies and test your observational skills.

  • Replayability: Anomalies appear randomly, ensuring no two playthroughs are the same. Stay alert—what you missed last time might return to haunt you.

  • Progressive Difficulty: The anomalies become more complex and harder to identify as the night wears on, increasing the stakes with every hour that passes.

  • Minimalist Controls: Easy-to-learn mechanics make the game accessible while keeping the focus on tension and discovery.

Can you uncover all the anomalies and survive the night, or will you fall victim to the unknown terrors lurking in the shadows?

Get ready for a simple yet spine-chilling experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat until dawn.
